result.purpose: Defines enumerations related to trading types for a trading system.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating enums and their related tests in a dedicated directory.

internal/enums/bridge/trade_type.go.purpose: Defines an enumeration for trade types used in a trading system.

internal/enums/bridge/trade_type_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for unmarshalling JSON into TradeType enum.
